unstretched length before shell border 5 body place a marker under both loops of the first st of each round to mark the start each round ends in the st before the marker when making an single_crochet right after a bean st push the bean down with your hook so that the bean sticks out to the front of the fabric before inserting your hook this will allow for the bean to pop and stay in place you can also make sure it pops out when working the round above it make sure you work in joined rounds and not in a spiral so the beans are positioned properly foundation round working along the edge of the ribbing chainless starting single_crochet in first valley between the ribs 2 single_crochet in same valley 3 single_crochet in each valley around the remainder of the ribbing see picture invisible join 144 162 180 198 216 234 252 270 single_crochet julivia com © julivia all rights reserved triks yoj fo seldnub waistband ribbing work the slip stitches quite loosely or it will become difficult to insert hook into them on return row back bumps begin chain 11 row 1 slip_stitch into back bump in second chain from hook and in each chain across chain 1 turn 10 sts row 2-97 2-109 2-121 2-133 2-145 2-157 2-169 2-181 slip_stitch in blo in each st how to across chain 1 turn 10 sts count ribs this will form 48 54 60 66 72 78 84 90 ribs see picture the ribbing now measures 12 13 5 15 16 5 18 19 5 21 using the blo of both layers turn right side out so the seam is inside do not fasten_off proceed to body positioning stitches of foundation round between the ribs round 1 chainless starting
